import React from 'react' import Product from '../products' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import{Row,Col,ListGroup,ListGroupItem,Image} from 'react-bootstrap' const ProductDetails = ({match}) => { const product = Product.find((p)=> p._id === match.params.id) return (

{product.name}

 Price : ${product.price} {product.description} {products.map( (product )=> ( )) }
) } export default ProductDetails
